title: Closed point-of-care Preparation (CPrep)
abstractText:
This project will establish a world-class consortium to innovatively address a generic bioprocessing market failure for the
cell therapy industry (CTI) - a robust validated platform technology to enable post-manufacturing process steps to be
carried out at the point of care (PoC). This Closed-point-of-care-Preparation device (CPrep) will increase patient safety and
enable a new generation of cell therapies that would otherwise have to be shipped fresh with its inherent logistics
problems.
